content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1756372,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/26a36a89-e578-4be9-a74e-86b7f64c0253/4207.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/26a36a89-e578-4be9-a74e-86b7f64c0253/4207.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"4207.jpg\",\"name\":\"4207.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"26a36a89-e578-4be9-a74e-86b7f64c0253\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":440,\"height\":308},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Colleague, now you are the member of Salesforce team. We are very proud to work with you and hope our journey will be successful and full of enjoyable moments. To make your adaptation easy and smart - use this onboarding block as the guidelines about mandatory information on Salesforce resources, structure, activities, people, etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We wish you success in reaching your professional goals! Enjoy your professional onboarding path!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
